18#ifndef _STPNCPY_H
19#define _STPNCPY_H
20
21#include <string.h>
22
23
24#ifdef __cplusplus
25extern "C" {
26#endif
27
28
29#if !HAVE_STPNCPY
30
31/* When not using the GNU libc we use the stpncpy implementation we
32 provide here. */
33#define stpncpy gnu_stpncpy
34
35/* Copy no more than N bytes of SRC to DST, returning a pointer past the
36 last non-NUL byte written into DST. */
37extern char *stpncpy (char *dst, const char *src, size_t n);
38
39#endif
40
41
42#ifdef __cplusplus
43}
44#endif
45
46
47#endif /* _STPNCPY_H */
48
